com.objetdirect.tatami.client
Interface DragAndDropListener

public interface DragAndDropListener

Interface that all objects have to implement if they want to listen drag and drop events. This interface permits 2 things :

  • indicates to the panel if he accepts drop or not(Method acceptDrop)
  • takes into account a Drop (method onDrop)

Author:
Henry

Method Summary

 void onDrop(com.google.gwt.user.client.ui.Widget draggable, com.google.gwt.user.client.ui.Widget target)

Method Detail

acceptDrop

boolean acceptDrop(com.google.gwt.user.client.ui.Widget draggable,
                   com.google.gwt.user.client.ui.Widget target)
Indicates if the object accept or not the listening of a drop event.

Parameters:
draggable - object dragged and dropped.
target - the target for the drop
Returns:
true si the drop is accepted, false otherwise.

onDrop

void onDrop(com.google.gwt.user.client.ui.Widget draggable,
            com.google.gwt.user.client.ui.Widget target)
Asks to the object to take account of the drop event.

Parameters:
draggable - object dragged and droped
target - target for the drop.
